createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

SavingsEntry.title: SavingsEntry
SavingsEntry.description: Represents a single savings entry made by the user.

currency.description: The currency of the saved amount (SLL).

usdAmount.description: The equivalent amount in USD after conversion.

entryDate.description: The date and time when the savings entry was created.

category.description: The category of the savings entry, e.g., 'General' or 'Balance Adjustment'.

Note.title: Note
Note.description: Represents a user's personal notes, goals, or financial will.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the note was last updated.

signature.description: A data URI of the user's signature image.

/users/{userId}/savingsEntries/{savingsE.description: Stores individual savings entries for each user. Enables path-based access control, ensuring only the user can read/write their own entries.

/users/{userId}/notes/{noteId}.description: Stores a user's personal notes. Each user has a single document for all their notes.
